sentences.sContent: Even though he’s 24 now, he’s still like a little child.
sentences.sCn: 虽然他现在24岁了，但还是像个小孩子。

sentences.sContent: I can still remember, even though it was so long ago.
sentences.sCn: 虽然是很久以前的事，但我还记得。

trans.tranOther: sed to emphasize that something is true although something else has happened or is true
